page.title: 18Pigeon House Farm:Uckington.
page.content: Pigeon House Farm is an average size farm of 132 acres . The owners name is Mr Carter he has a wife and a teenage daughter . They both help him on his farm because he does not employ any workers. One of the main crops he grows is winter wheat.The wheat is harvested from the middle of September to November.When it has been harvested it is sold for bread making.The two other crops he grows are sugar beet and potatoes .He has 20 acres of sugar beet and 6 acres of potatoes.Mr Carter also has 120 breeding ewes ,160 lambs and 2 rams.One of his fat lambs will sell for about Â£44.oo.Mr Carter has one pet dog.
